bibl.title: Dionysius Scytobrachion.
bibl.note: Part I. The New Fragments: P. Hibeh II, 186 (= Pack2 2449); - P. Oxy. XXXVII, 2812; - P. Mich. Inv. 1316 verso (first ed.). 2nd cent. A.D. From a commentary on an Argonaut story or a treatise on literary criticism (?). With a citation of Dionysius Scythobrachion.
bibl.seg: Rusten Jeffrey S., Dionysius Scytobrachion. (Papyrologica Coloniensia. X.)
Opladen, Westdeutscher Verlag, 1982, 8Â°, 183 pp. et 2 pll.

Part I. The New Fragments: P. Hibeh II, 186 (= Pack2 2449); - P. Oxy. XXXVII, 2812; - P. Mich. Inv. 1316 verso (first ed.). 2nd cent. A.D. From a commentary on an Argonaut story or a treatise on literary criticism (?). With a citation of Dionysius Scythobrachion.

C.R. par Malcolm Campbell, CR N.S., 33 (1983) pp. 314-315. - Marco Sartori, Athenaeum 62 (1984) pp. 383-384. - Hans Schwabl, WS 97 = N.F. 18 (1984) p. 233. - Ursula Treu, ArchPF 31 (1985) p. 47. - S.L. Radt, BibO 44 (1987) coll. 155-158.
